io.libsoft.contactcard.view

Class GalleryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<GalleryAdapter.Holder>
      • io.libsoft.contactcard.view.GalleryAdapter

  • public class GalleryAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<GalleryAdapter.Holder>
    Gallery adapter that allows viewing of database images.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GalleryAdapter.Holder
      Binder for View items in a RecyclerView and Image items in a GalleryAdapter.
      static interface  GalleryAdapter.OnContextListener
      Function interface for a long press on a item in the gallery, currently unused.
